name: Unholy Rollers
description:
Made for PIGSquad's Summer Slow Jams 2019
Technical Theme: arcade
Creative Theme : occult classic

Credits
Code: NextLevelBanana
Art: WhileLoup
Music: JCizle
Hardware/Construction/Circuitry: MekeMonster

Explanation

This is a game in which a red player and a blue player use a physical skee-ball-type device to cast spells in order to summon a demon. 

Turns out putting this together IS as complicated as it sounds, so, still a work in progress!

The downloadable version posted here is wired to use normal keyboard input, so you CAN play it, though it's probably not as much fun.
Red Player Controls:
AOEUIP

Blue Player Controls:
HTNS-G
